meanings.definition: Quick and skillful in action or thought
meanings.sent1: She is a defter runner than her friends.
meanings.sent2: The defter squirrel swiftly climbed the tree.
meanings.sent3: The defter cat caught the toy mouse in record time.
meanings.sent4: Her defter mind raced with ideas for the project.
meanings.sent5: The defter fingers of the pianist danced across the keys.

meanings.definition: Neatly skillful and quick in one's movements or actions
meanings.sent1: He was defter with a paintbrush than anyone in the class.
meanings.sent2: The defter chef effortlessly prepared the gourmet meal.
meanings.sent3: The defter magician made the coin disappear with a flick of his wrist.
meanings.sent4: Her defter handwriting was admired by all her classmates.
meanings.sent5: The defter dancer moved gracefully across the stage.
